title: Ticket #3337: broken links on DAGMan web page
description: Most of the links are broken on http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/dagman/dagman.html. This URL is used as part of a software citation in some pending NSF proposals, so I would appreciate it if someone could fix them. Thanks!
remarks:
2012-Nov-27 10:02:17 by nwp:
I fixed the relevant page in CVS, and committed the change. I did not successfully run the "generate_html" script.

2012-Nov-27 13:19:36 by nwp:
I successfully ran generate_html and now the links on the page are correct and functioning.

2012-Nov-27 13:22:36 by nwp:
I had the following output: 
$ /s/std/bin/perl generate_html src
Updating /p/condor/public/html//htcondor/logos/index.html
Updating /p/condor/public/html//htcondor/dagman/dagman.html
Updating /p/condor/public/html//htcondor/error-pages/404.html
I only changed the dagman.html file; I hope the other changes are appropriate!
creator: pfc
